mapper.sql: id, billnumber, goodid, geelybillnumber, geelycount, batch, count, boxcount, remarks, username, createtime, warehouseid
mapper.select:
select w.id, w.billnumber, w.goodid, w.geelybillnumber, w.geelycount, w.batch, w.count, w.boxcount, w.remarks,w.username, w.createtime, w.warehouseid from warehouseentry w,good g,supplier s where w.goodid=g.id and g.supplierid=s.id
and g.goodcode like '%${goodcode}%'
and g.goodname like '%${goodname}%'
and s.suppliercode like '%${suppliercode}%'
and s.suppliername like '%${suppliername}%'
and w.billnumber like '%${billnumber}%'
and w.geelybillnumber like '%${geelybillnumber}%'
and w.warehouseid = #{warehouseid}
and to_days(w.createtime) =to_days(#{date})
order by w.createtime desc,w.billnumber,w.geelybillnumber limit #{index},30

select count(*) from ( select w.id, w.billnumber, w.goodid, w.geelybillnumber, w.geelycount, w.batch, w.count, w.boxcount, w.remarks,w.username, w.createtime, w.warehouseid from warehouseentry w,good g,supplier s where w.goodid=g.id and g.supplierid=s.id
and g.goodcode like '%${goodcode}%'
and g.goodname like '%${goodname}%'
and s.suppliercode like '%${suppliercode}%'
and s.suppliername like '%${suppliername}%'
and w.billnumber like '%${billnumber}%'
and w.geelybillnumber like '%${geelybillnumber}%'
and w.warehouseid = #{warehouseid}
and to_days(w.createtime) =to_days(#{date})
) as a
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into warehouseentry
billnumber,
goodid,
geelybillnumber,
geelycount,
batch,
count,
boxcount,
remarks,
username,
createtime,
warehouseid,
#{billnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{good.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{geelybillnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{geelycount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{boxcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{warehouse.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update warehouseentry
billnumber = #{billnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodid = #{good.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
geelybillnumber = #{geelybillnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
geelycount = #{geelycount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
boxcount = #{boxcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
warehouseid = #{warehouse.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
